channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 03:40 Alarm lifted in Chernihiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 03:40 Alarm lifted in Chernihiv region. Follow further messages. #Chernihiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 03:40 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still in effect in:- Marhanets and Marhanets territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community- Chervonohryhoriv territorial community
item.description: 游리 03:40 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still in effect in:- Marhanets and Marhanets territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community- Chervonohryhoriv territorial community#Dnipropetrovsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
